description: Palindromic squares with an odd number of digits.
links: P. De Geest, Subsets of Palindromic Squares
mathematica: id[n_]:=IntegerDigits[n]; palQ[n_]:=FromDigits[Reverse[id[n]]]==n; t={}; Do[If[palQ[x=n^2] && OddQ[Length[id[x]]],AppendTo[t,x]],{n,101000}]; t (* _Jayanta Basu_, May 13 2013 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
